exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : Z H1 : rel_prime m n H2 : distinct_parity m n Unable to unify "rel_prime m n" with "rel_prime (m + n + (n - m)) (m + n - (n - m))".
In environment m, n : Z H1 : rel_prime m n H2 : distinct_parity m n Unable to unify "Zis_gcd (?M1840 * ?M1840) (?M1841 * ?M1841) 1" with "Zis_gcd (m + n + (n - m)) (m + n - (n - m)) 1".
In environment m, n : Z H1 : rel_prime m n H2 : distinct_parity m n Unable to unify "?M1840 - ?M1841 = ?M1842 + ?M1840 - (?M1842 + ?M1841)" with "Zis_gcd (m + n + (n - m)) (m + n - (n - m)) 1".

original: intros m n H1 H2. apply relp_sum. apply H1. apply prop2. apply Zminus_plus_simpl_l_reverse.
